description:
Makunouchi Ippo is a shy fellow and gets bullied throughout highschool until one day he meets Takamura who introduces him into the world of boxing. This sparks a determination to find an answer to one question "How does it feel to be strong?".
Noticed by Takamura`s coach Genji Kamogawa, he starts training in the Kamogawa gym where he rapidly grows into a boxing prodigy.
name: Makunouchi Ippo
